title: Snowbound
creator_credit: Robert Young, Linda Gottlieb and Learning Corporation of America
brief_description: A shortened version of the motion picture “Snowbound”. Features two teenagers who learn to understand themselves and each other when they are caught in a desolate area during a snow storm. Written by Edward Pomerantz and Kurt Villadsen from the book by Harry Mazer.
